title: Jon Krawczynski and Tim Bontemps
description:
Zach talks to Jon Krawczynski of The Athletic about the Wolves gamble on Rudy Gobert, then ESPN's Tim Bontemps talks Kevin Durant trade landscape, Donovan Mitchell's future in Utah, and the Celtics loading up. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
